info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 6:39AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Nueces and southwestern San Patricio Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 638 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Robstown, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corpus Christi, Robstown, Clarkwood, Annaville, Calallen, North San Pedro and Tuloso. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 9 and 15. US Highway 77 near mile marker 672. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
